ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates switching from Value to Category axis dynamically
ExampleDefinition.Description:
This example demonstrates the IndexNumericAxis type - a new Category axis introduced in v8.7 of SciChart WPF. It enables smooth scrolling of a chart and precise positioning between data points. IndexNumericAxis allows numeric values on the XAxis, while the IndexDateTimeAxis type supports date values.
Using a simple attached property we are able to change axis type. Take a look at the source-code to see how we do this.
